definitions.definition: The chemical processes that occur within a living organism in order to maintain life.
examples: The metabolisms of aerobic bacteria require oxygen

definitions.definition: The rate at which these processes occur for a given organism
examples: Small animals have a much higher metabolism than large animals because they lose more body heat

definitions.definition: The processes that maintain any dynamic system.

main_definition: ( physiology ) The chemical processes that occur within a living organism in order to maintain life.
secondary_definitions: ( physiology , by extension ) The rate at which these processes occur for a given organism
( figurative , by extension ) The processes that maintain any dynamic system.
